law.text: KRS 304.7-401, 304.7-403, 304.7-405, 304.7-407, 304.7-409, 304.7-411, 304.7-413, 304.7-415, 304.7-417, 304.7-419, 304.7-421, and 304.7-423 shall apply to the investments and investment practices of domestic life and health insurers, and of United States branches of alien life and health insurers entered through this state.
law.history: Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 388, sec. 7, effective July 14, 2000.
